title: Budget 2022 – Boost for the tech and start-up ecosystem - The Times of India Blog
content: Budget 2022 – Boost for the tech and start-up ecosystem  The Times of India Blog
description: The Union Budget 2022 pillared itself on promotion of technology and digitalisation across sectors. Aptly referred to by many as the ‘Budget for Digital India’, the announcements come as a welcome step for the tech...
